1.「おおーい メーデ。村人名簿の古いやつを| どこに しまったか 覚えておるか？: Hey... Do you remember where you put the old|villager list?

2.「あら？ ５０年以上前の 古いものは| だいぶ前に 捨てませんでしたー？: Oh? Didn't you throw away all your old stuff|over 50 years ago?

3.「そうだった！ ヒューザのやつに| 捨てにいかせたのを 忘れとったぞ。: That's right! I forgot to tell Huza that I|sent her to dump it.

4.<pipipi_low>「ふむ……。この事件の手がかりは| 村長により 闇に葬ら: <pipipi_low>Hmm... The clue to this case is about to be|buried by the village chief. However, I don't|think the village chief is the culprit.

6.<pipipi_low>「お父さ……セトリー村長。| その村人名簿を どこに捨て: <pipipi_low>Father... Setori... Would you mind telling me|where you dumped that list of villagers?

7.「う～ん。たしか ヒューザが| レーナム緑野にある 忘却のほら穴に| 出かけると: I think... I think it was Husa who told me to|throw it away when I went to the Pit of|Oblivion in Greenfield, Lanham.

10.<pipipi_low>「私の推理によれば 意外と律儀なヒューザは| 言われたと: <pipipi_low>I have a theory that the surprisingly law-|abiding Huesa did as he was told and dumped|the villager list in that cave.

11.<pipipi_low>「聞いていたかね <pc>くん。| ダーリア事件の 重要: <pipipi_low>Did you hear what I said?<pc> I think I've found the key to the Dahlia|case! I've discovered that the key to the|Dahlia case lies in the cave!

12.<pipipi_low>「ここからは 助手の仕事だ。| アタマを使うのは私。肉体: <pipipi_low>From here, my assistant... Use your head...|The physical work is for you... This is the|most efficient way...

13.<pipipi_low>「私は ここで待っている。| レーナム緑野にある 忘却の: <pipipi_low>I'll wait here... I need you to go deep into|the maw of oblivion in the Green Fields of|Lanham...

14.魔物が 地面から 何かを掘りだしたようだ。: The demon dug something out of the ground...

17.<pipipi_low>「どれどれ……。ふむ。| なるほど なるほど……。: <pipipi_low>Let's see... Hmm. I see. I see...

18.「ダーリアさんの名前を 見つけた！| 花婿のレグさんも いっしょに載ってるわ。: I found Miss Dahlia's name! The groom, Reg,|is also in the list...

19.「ふたりの関係は 夫婦って書かれてる。| つまりこれは 結婚式の直前に作られた|: It says here that they're husband and wife.|So this must be a list of names made just|before the wedding.

21.「ほら ここんとこ。| ひとりだけ 名前が消されてるみたい。: Look, here... There's one guy. His name's|been erased.

22.「名前の他は 残ってるね。えっと……。| 性別は……女で 年齢は……１０歳。: Other than the name, there's no other...|Let's see... Gender... Female. Age: ......

25.「あっ ぼーっとして ごめんね。| お……おかげで 重要な手がかりが| 見つかっ: I'm a bit spaced out... Oh... Thanks to you,|I think I found an important clue.

26.「でも この続きは また今度にしたいの。| 今日は ここで終わりね！: But we'll talk about this another time...|That's it for today!

27.「私の助手を やってくれて ありがとう。| お礼に これを もらってくれる？: Thank you for being my assistant. Can I have|this as a thank you?

28.「そ……それじゃ しばらくしたら また来て。| <pc>のこと 待ってるから。: Well... I'll see you in a little while.<pc> I'm waiting for...
